title: CBSL Exchange rates for today (19)
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Central Bank of Sri Lanka announced the Exchange rates for today (19) as follows;
Three-wheeler fares to increase; Drivers to stop using meter, & negotiate fare with customer
IMF lauds India’s assistance to Sri Lanka during Economic Crisis
‘Present economical, political & social catastrophe was man made’ – Sajith
